name: Zahar King

projects.title: CoHabit
projects.description: Complete brand identity design for a tech startup
projects.explanation: Created a comprehensive brand identity system including logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines. The project involved extensive research into the client's target market and competitors to ensure the design stood out while maintaining brand relevance.
projects.challenges: Balancing modern tech aesthetics with traditional industry expectations
projects.results: Increased brand recognition by 40% and improved customer engagement

projects.title: UI/UX Design System
projects.description: Zine for the UC Davis Pantry
projects.explanation: Developed a comprehensive design system for a fintech mobile app, including component library, interaction patterns, and accessibility guidelines. The system was created to ensure consistency across the app while maintaining flexibility for future updates.
projects.challenges: Creating a scalable system that worked across different device sizes and platforms
projects.results: Reduced design inconsistencies by 60% and improved development efficiency

projects.title: Social Media Campaign
projects.explanation: Led the creative direction for a 3-month social media campaign, creating engaging visual content that resonated with the target audience. The campaign included static posts, animated content, and interactive stories.
projects.challenges: Maintaining brand consistency while creating diverse content
projects.results: Achieved 200% increase in social media engagement

projects.title: Product Packaging Design
projects.explanation: Designed eco-friendly packaging for a sustainable product line, focusing on minimal waste and recyclable materials. The design process included material research, 3D modeling, and prototype testing.
projects.results: Reduced packaging waste by 45% while maintaining product protection

projects.title: Website Redesign
projects.explanation: Led the complete redesign of an e-commerce website, focusing on improving user experience and conversion rates. The project included user research, wireframing, and high-fidelity design creation.
projects.challenges: Optimizing for both desktop and mobile experiences
projects.results: Increased conversion rate by 35% and improved user engagement

projects.title: Print Campaign
projects.explanation: Created a series of print advertisements for a luxury magazine campaign. The project involved concept development, photography direction, and layout design for multiple ad formats.
projects.challenges: Maintaining visual impact across different print formats
projects.results: Received industry recognition and increased brand prestige

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.
